meaningMnemonic: <radical>Stand</radical> on your <radical>older brother</radical>. Now <radical>stand</radical> on your <radical>older brother</radical> again. You wish to stand on, and above, your older brother. You <kanji>compete</kanji> over and over again, to stand atop your older brother.
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>compete</kanji> with your older brother because only one of you may go to <reading>きょう</reading>と. Whoever stands on top the most gets to go to きょうと, so you must compete for a spot.
